workflow.name: Real estate property search with SQL database and email delivery
workflow.description:
**Transform property searches into personalized experiences! This powerful automation delivers dream home matches straight to clients' inboxes with professional CSV reports - all from a simple web form.**

## üöÄ What this workflow does

Create a complete real estate search experience that works 24/7:

‚ú® **Smart Web Form** - Beautiful property search form captures client preferences  
üß† **Dynamic SQL Builder** - Intelligently creates optimized queries from user input  
‚ö° **Lightning Database Search** - Scans 1000+ properties in milliseconds  
üìä **Professional CSV Export** - Excel-ready reports with complete property details  
üìß **Automated Email Delivery** - Personalized emails with property previews and attachments  

### üéØ Perfect for:
- **Real Estate Agents** - Generate leads and impress clients with instant service
- **Property Managers** - Automate tenant matching and recommendations  
- **Brokerages** - Provide 24/7 self-service property discovery
- **Developers** - Showcase available properties with professional automation

## üí° Why this workflow is a game-changer

> "From property search to professional report delivery in under 30 seconds!"

- ‚ö° **Instant Results**: Zero wait time for property matches
- üé® **Professional Output**: Beautiful emails that showcase your expertise  
- üì± **Mobile Optimized**: Works flawlessly on all devices
- üß† **Smart Filtering**: Only searches criteria clients actually specify
- üìà **Infinitely Scalable**: Handles unlimited searches simultaneously

## üìä Real Estate Data Source

Built on authentic US market data from the [Github](https://github.com/dataminexcode/n8n-workflow/tree/main/Real%20Estate%20Property%20Search%20with%20SQL%20Database%20and%20Email%20Delivery/data):

- üèòÔ∏è **1000+ Real Properties** across all US states
- üí∞ **Actual Market Prices** from legitimate listings  
- üè† **Complete Property Details** (bedrooms, bathrooms, square footage, lot size)
- üìç **Verified Locations** with accurate cities, states, and ZIP codes
- üè¢ **Broker Information** for authentic real estate context

## üõ†Ô∏è Quick Setup Guide

### Prerequisites Checklist ‚úÖ
- [ ] SQL Server database (MySQL/PostgreSQL also supported)
- [ ] Gmail account for automated emails
- [ ] n8n instance (cloud or self-hosted)
- [ ] 20 minutes setup time

### Step 1: Import Real Estate Data üì•
1. üåü Download the [data](https://github.com/dataminexcode/n8n-workflow/tree/main/Real%20Estate%20Property%20Search%20with%20SQL%20Database%20and%20Email%20Delivery/data)
2. üíæ Download CSV file (1000+ properties included)
3. üóÑÔ∏è Create SQL Server table with this exact schema:

```sql
CREATE TABLE [REALTOR].[dbo].[realtor_usa_price] (
    brokered_by BIGINT,
    status NVARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(12,2),
    bed INT,
    bath DECIMAL(3,1),
    acre_lot DECIMAL(10,8),
    street BIGINT,
    city NVARCHAR(100),
    state NVARCHAR(50),
    zip_code INT,
    house_size INT,
    prev_sold_date NVARCHAR(50)
);
```

5. üìä Import your CSV data into this table

### Step 2: Configure Database Connection üîó
1. üîê Set up Microsoft SQL Server credentials in n8n
2. ‚úÖ Test connection to ensure everything works
3. üéØ Workflow is pre-configured for the table structure above

### Step 3: Gmail Setup (The Magic Touch) üìß
1. üåê Visit [Google Cloud Console](https://console.cloud.google.com)
2. üÜï Create new project (or use existing)
3. üîì Enable Gmail API in API Library
4. üîë Create OAuth2 credentials (Web Application)
5. ‚öôÔ∏è Add your n8n callback URL to authorized redirects
6. üîó Configure Gmail OAuth2 credentials in n8n
7. ‚ú® Authorize your Google account

### Step 4: Launch Your Property Search Portal üöÄ
1. üìã Import this workflow template (form is pre-configured)
2. üåç Copy your webhook URL from the Property Search Form node
3. üîç Test with a sample property search
4. üì® Check email delivery with CSV attachment
5. üéâ Go live and start impressing clients!

## üé® Customization Playground

### üè∑Ô∏è Personalize Your Brand
```javascript
// Customize email subjects in the Gmail node
"üè† Exclusive Properties Curated Just for You - ${results.length} Perfect Matches!"
"‚ú® Your Dream Home Portfolio - Handpicked by Our Experts"
"üéØ Hot Market Alert - ${results.length} Premium Properties Inside!"
```

### üîß Advanced Enhancements
- **üé® HTML Email Templates**: Create stunning visual emails with property images
- **üìä Analytics Dashboard**: Track popular searches and user engagement  
- **üîî Smart Alerts**: Set up automated price drop notifications
- **üì± Mobile Integration**: Connect to React Native or Flutter apps
- **ü§ñ AI Descriptions**: Add ChatGPT for compelling property descriptions

### üåç Multi-Database Flexibility
```javascript
// Easy database switching
// MySQL: Replace Microsoft SQL node ‚Üí MySQL node
// PostgreSQL: Swap for PostgreSQL node  
// MongoDB: Use MongoDB node with JSON queries
// Even CSV files: Use CSV reading nodes for smaller datasets
```

## üöÄ Advanced Features & Extensions

### üî• Pro Tips for Power Users
- **üîÑ Bulk Processing**: Handle multiple searches simultaneously
- **üíæ Smart Caching**: Store popular searches for lightning-fast results
- **üìà Lead Scoring**: Track which properties generate most interest
- **üìÖ Follow-up Automation**: Schedule nurturing email sequences

### üéØ Integration Possibilities
- **üè¢ CRM Connection**: Auto-add qualified leads to your CRM
- **üìÖ Calendar Integration**: Add property viewing scheduling
- **üìä Price Monitoring**: Track market trends and price changes
- **üì± Social Media**: Auto-share featured properties to social platforms
- **üí¨ Chat Integration**: Connect to WhatsApp or SMS for instant alerts


## üîó Expand Your Real Estate Automation

### üåü Related Workflow Ideas
- ü§ñ **AI Property Valuation** - Add machine learning for price predictions
- üìä **Market Analysis Reports** - Generate comprehensive market insights  
- üì± **SMS Property Alerts** - Instant text notifications for hot properties
- üè¢ **Commercial Property Search** - Adapt for office and retail spaces
- üíπ **Investment ROI Calculator** - Add financial analysis for investors
- üèòÔ∏è **Neighborhood Analytics** - Include school ratings and demographics

### üõ†Ô∏è Technical Extensions
- üì∑ **Image Processing**: Auto-resize and optimize property photos
- üó∫Ô∏è **Map Integration**: Add interactive property location maps
- üì± **Progressive Web App**: Create mobile app experience
- üîî **Push Notifications**: Real-time alerts for saved searches


### üöÄ Get Started Now
1. Import this workflow template
2. Configure your database and Gmail
3. Customize branding and messaging
4. Launch your professional property search portal
5. Watch client satisfaction soar!

parameters.formDescription: Search through 1000+ real estate properties in our database

parameters.message:
=Hi there! üëã

Great news! We found {{ $('Microsoft SQL').all().length }} properties that match your search criteria.

üè† TOP MATCHES:
{{ $('Microsoft SQL').all().slice(0, 3).map(property => 
`üí∞ $${property.json.price.toLocaleString()} - ${property.json.bed}bed/${property.json.bath}bath in ${property.json.city}, ${property.json.state}`
).join('\n') }}

üìé COMPLETE RESULTS ATTACHED
All {{ $('Microsoft SQL').all().length }} properties are in the attached CSV file - perfect for Excel!

üéØ YOUR SEARCH:
- Price Range: ${{ $('Build SQL Query').first().json.searchCriteria.priceRange.min?.toLocaleString() || 'Any' }} - ${{ $('Build SQL Query').first().json.searchCriteria.priceRange.max?.toLocaleString() || 'Any' }}
- Bedrooms: {{ $('Build SQL Query').first().json.searchCriteria.bedrooms.min || 'Any' }}+
- Location: {{ $('Build SQL Query').first().json.searchCriteria.location.city || $('Build SQL Query').first().json.searchCriteria.location.state || 'Anywhere' }}

Happy house hunting! üè°‚ú®

Your Property Search Team
parameters.subject: =üè† Your Dream Home Search Results - {{ $('Microsoft SQL').all().length }} Properties Found!

parameters.content:
## üéØ 1. START HERE!
User fills out their dream home criteria - price range, bedrooms, location, etc. This triggers the entire search process!

## üß† 2. SMART QUERY BUILDER
Takes user input and creates a dynamic SQL query. Only adds conditions for fields the user actually filled out - no empty searches!

## üîç 3. DATABASE DETECTIVE
Searches through 1000+ real estate properties in SQL Server and finds matches based on user criteria. Returns real property data!

## üìä 4. EXCEL MAGIC
Transforms search results into a beautiful CSV file that users can open in Excel or Google Sheets for easy viewing and sorting!

## üìß 5. DELIVERY SERVICE
Sends personalized email with search results attached. User gets their dream properties delivered straight to their inbox!
